message.entry: Invalid data types. Input arrays must be double or single.
Incorrect dimensions for least squares algorithm. Check that the number of rows in the first array matches the number of rows in the second array.
Arrays have incompatible sizes. For every dimension beyond the first two, the dimension sizes for both arrays must either be the same, or one of them must be 1.
Tolerance argument can specify either a scalar nonnegative tolerance for all pages or an array of nonnegative tolerances of size {0} that specifies a different tolerance for each matrix page.
Invalid data type. Tolerance must be a real scalar or array and must be of type double or single.

"RegularizationFactor" value must either be a scalar nonnegative regularization factor for all pages or an array of nonnegative regularization factors of size {0} that specifies a different regularization factor for each page.
Invalid data type. "RegularizationFactor" must be a real scalar or array and must be of type double or single.
Invalid name-value arguments. "RegularizationFactor" must be followed by a corresponding value.
